      • checkFolder

        public static java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle> checkFolder(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                            java.lang.String suffix)
        Loads FileHandles from a folder with given prefix and suffix
        Parameters:
        prefix - prefixes to search for (null or empty to ignore)
        suffix - suffixes to search for (null or empty to ignore)
        Returns:
        returns a list with the file handles within the folder

      • checkFolderToHashMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle> checkFolderToHashMap(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                                                         java.lang.String suffix)
        Loads FileHandles from a folder with given prefix and suffix and puts them in a hashmap
        Parameters:
        prefix - prefixes to search for (null or empty to ignore)
        suffix - suffixes to search for (null or empty to ignore)
        Returns:
        returns a hashmap with the files as value and the names as key
